title: Animation Analysis
description: Analyzes resource pack animation files to count animations and bone references. Used to assess animation complexity.

fields.title: Animation Count
fields.description: Count of animation definitions in resource pack animation files.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of animations as a number

fields.title: Bone Count
fields.description: Count of bone references used across animations. More bones generally means more complex animations.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of bone references as a number
